game

Class SelectValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.SelectValue

  • public class SelectValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used as return value on selectPawn in Logic class. Contains a boolean called allowed which tells if the pawn is allowed to be selected. Also contains the positions the pawn can move to.
    Author:
    Andr√© Hansson
